CpuNumberOfCores.description: The number of cores in the CPU

CpuNumberOfThreads.description: The number of threads in the CPU

CpuBaseClock.description: The base clock speed of the CPU (in GHz)

CpuCacheL1.description: The size of the Level 1 cache of the CPU (in KB)

CpuCacheL2.description: The size of the Level 2 cache of the CPU (in KB)

CpuCacheL3.description: The size of the Level 3 cache of the CPU (in KB)

CpuDieSize.description: The die size of the CPU (in mm²)

CpuFrequency.description: The frequency of the CPU (in GHz)

CpuMultiplierUnlocked.description: Whether the multiplier of the CPU is unlocked (1 for yes, 0 for no)

CpuProcessSize.description: The process size of the CPU (in nm)

CpuTDP.description: The Thermal Design Power of the CPU (in W)

CpuNumberOfTransistors.description: The number of transistors in the CPU (in millions)

CpuTurboClock.description: The turbo clock speed of the CPU (in GHz)

GpuBandwidth.description: The bandwidth of the GPU (in GB/s)

GpuBaseClock.description: The base clock speed of the GPU (in MHz)

GpuBoostClock.description: The boost clock speed of the GPU (in MHz)

GpuBus.interface.description: The bus interface of the GPU

value_dict.b'PCIe 3.0 x16': The GPU bus interface is PCIe 3.0 x16
value_dict.b'PCIe 4.0 x16': The GPU bus interface is PCIe 4.0 x16

GpuNumberOfComputeUnits.description: The number of compute units in the GPU

GpuDieSize.description: The die size of the GPU (in mm²)

GpuDirectX.description: The version of DirectX supported by the GPU

GpuNumberOfExecutionUnits.description: The number of execution units in the GPU

GpuFP32Performance.description: The FP32 performance of the GPU (in GFLOPS)

GpuMemoryBus.description: The memory bus width of the GPU (in bits)

GpuMemorySize.description: The memory size of the GPU (in MB)

GpuMemoryType.description: The type of memory used by the GPU

GpuOpenCL.description: The version of OpenCL supported by the GPU

GpuOpenGL.description: The version of OpenGL supported by the GPU

GpuPixelRate.description: The pixel rate of the GPU (in GPixel/s)

GpuProcessSize.description: The process size of the GPU (in nm)

GpuNumberOfROPs.description: The number of Render Output Units in the GPU

GpuShaderModel.description: The shader model supported by the GPU

GpuNumberOfShadingUnits.description: The number of shading units in the GPU

GpuNumberOfTMUs.description: The number of Texture Mapping Units in the GPU

GpuTextureRate.description: The texture rate of the GPU (in GTexel/s)

GpuNumberOfTransistors.description: The number of transistors in the GPU (in millions)

GpuVulkan.description: The version of Vulkan supported by the GPU

GameName.description: The name of the game for which the FPS is measured

GameResolution.description: The resolution at which the game is played

value_dict.1080.0: The game is played at a resolution of 1080p

GameSetting.description: The setting at which the game is played (low, med, high)

value_dict.b'med': The game is played at medium settings
value_dict.b'max': The game is played at maximum settings

FPS.description: The frames per second achieved in the game

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in computer hardware and gaming performance.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the computer hardware and game settings, please predict the FPS (frames per second).
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted FPS is [{FPS}].
